content:
That sounds like a great plan! You're covering all the bases with a mix of football-themed items, humorous awards, and some fun snacks to boot! The NFL team-branded hats will be a great prize for the serious football fans, while the football-shaped snacks will add a playful touch. And, of course, the "Worst Draft Pick" trophy will provide some good-natured teasing and humor to the party.

Remember, the key is to have fun and not take things too seriously. Fantasy football is all about enjoying the game with friends, and your prizes will definitely contribute to a lively and entertaining atmosphere. I'm sure your friends will appreciate the effort you're putting into making this a memorable draft party.

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you and your friends have an amazing time at the draft party, and may the best team win!
